key.name: dump-path
key.description: Path to the directory where dumps are stored. Empty value corresponds to using default path.

key.name: flatten-output
key.summary: Output directly into dump destination directory
key.description: By default, subfolders are always created when requested by nxdumptool. This options forces nxdumpclient to always output single-file dumps into dump directory and reduces nesting for multi-file dumps.

key.name: checksum-nca
key.description: NCA file names are SHA256 checksums of their contents. This option allows to verify checksums of dumped NCA and NSP files.

key.name: prompted-for-udev-rules
key.summary: Has user closed udev rules prompt
key.description: This is only used in cases where udev rules must me manually installed.
